Question.Subject: Getting a PSP Wireless Connection?
Question.Content: Is there anyway i can get a wireless connection at my home on my PSP, if i don't have a router?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
yeah....sure but u must have wifi connceions...in your nearby area....if ur neighbours have wifi conncetion u ask dem for it .......or u have to hack it.......
nearby offices will most probably havin wifi conncetions try hacking dat
first of all turn on your psp and scan for wifi connections
you can learn how to hack dat ferom youtube

Answer.Content: You need a wireless internet connection to access the net on your PSP.

yeah....sure but u must have wifi connceions...in your nearby area....if ur neighbours have wifi conncetion u ask dem for it .......or u have to hack it.......
nearby offices will most probably havin wifi conncetions try hacking dat
first of all turn on your psp and scan for wifi connections
